bilingual.source: He retracted his statement after realizing it was incorrect.
bilingual.target: 他在意识到声明有误后撤回了声明。
她不得不撤回她的声明。
他们不信任政府的声明。

bilingual.source: They asked him to take back his statement.
bilingual.target: 他们要求他收回他的声明。
她的声明引起了大家的关注。

bilingual.source: The government issued a new policy statement.
bilingual.target: 政府发表了新的政策声明。

bilingual.source: The supra statement summarizes the main points.
bilingual.target: 以上声明总结了主要观点。

list.abstract: Statement 是 Java 执行数据库操作的一个重要方法，用于在已经建立数据库连接的基础上，向数据库发送要执行的SQL语句。Statement对象，用于执行不带参数的简单SQL语句。该常量指示调用 getMoreResults 时应该关闭以前一直打开的所有 ResultSet 对象。
statement是一个英语单词，可以用作名词和动词，可以翻译为声明、结算单，等等。

yingyinNormal.en: You have to put out a statement. Another apology. No. A statement.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你必须发表声明。又是道歉。不，是声明。

yingyinNormal.en: I wish he'd make the damn statement too, and maybe he will.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我也希望他能发表声明，他或许会的。

yingyinNormal.en: My foundation has already issued a statement in support of books. Sir?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的基金会已经发布了声明表示支持出版业。

yingyinNormal.en: You'll have to drag me out of here because I'm not giving that statement.
yingyinNormal.zh: 恐怕你得把我拖出去了，因为我不会做那个声明。

yingyinNormal.en: No. The best statement is no statement. Besides, I want Claire to be the voice on this until we're ready. Yes, sir. Quite a crowd out there. Well, we better bring Birch in first. Yes, sir.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，最好的声明就是不做声明。再说，我们准备好前，我要克莱尔来就此事发声。是，先生。外面人好多。我们最好先让博奇进来。是，先生。

yingyinNormal.en: You're going to issue a statement saying that you're giving a million dollars to charity.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你要发表一项声明宣布将一百万美元捐作慈善。

yingyinNormal.en: Killing the Chancellor tonight was a statement the start of a new phase.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今晚刺杀总统的行动，就是一个声明，宣告一个新时代的开启。

yingyinNormal.en: They're not going to repeal the law. The statement is a prerequisite for your release.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们不可能废除法律，你必须发表声明才能被释放。

yingyinNormal.en: You have a statement? You anticipate any other big WikiLeaks info dumps coming down the pike?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你写好声明了吗？还会不会有其他重大的维基解密事件？

yingyinNormal.en: That's what they're afraid of. The statement's about the FBI. Everybody trusts the FBI.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们怕的就是这个。声明是关于联调局的，大家都相信联调局。

yingyinNormal.en: We release a statement with them. We don't want people working it out on their own. Yes, sir.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们发表一份声明，我们不希望要让人们自己去琢磨。好的，长官。

yingyinNormal.en: Would you like to issue a statement about Eric Thompson's abrupt resignation as Student Council President?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你想对埃里克·汤普森突然辞职学生会主席一事发表声明吗？

yingyinNormal.en: At least a statement from the Kree Empire saying that they condemn his actions. He is slaughtering children. Families.
yingyinNormal.zh: 克里帝国至少发表声明，谴责他的行动，他在屠杀儿童，家庭。

yingyinNormal.en: I can do it if you want, sir. I wrote the statement. No, it only works if it comes from Francis.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果您同意，我可以来道歉，先生，是我写的声明。不，只有弗兰西斯亲自出面才管用。

yingyinNormal.en: Sure. Here's my statement. Pbht! My sources say that he was caught selling school saxophones on Craigslist.
yingyinNormal.zh: 行啊，这是我的声明——呸！我的线人说他被抓到在分类广告网上倒卖学校的萨克斯管。

yingyinNormal.en: We need to make a case. Prepare the world for when you make a statement. I think Francis needs to be front and center on this.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们得造势。你做声明之前让全世界做好准备。我认为弗兰西斯得来做主导。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I'll make a statement and blame it on the politics of personal destruction. No, Doug, I'm afraid that's just not going to be enough.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我会发表声明说这是人身攻击式的政治手段。不，道格，恐怕这些仍不够。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm gonna need you to make a statement saying that you misspoke, and that you're confident the physics community is close to a major breakthrough.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要你发表一份声明说自己言论过失，并且你坚信物理学界即将迎来一个重大突破。

yingyinNormal.en: We've gotten no official statement from the White House as of yet, either the president's precise condition or the whereabouts of Vice President Blythe.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们也还没得到白宫的官方声明，不了解总统的具体情况或是布莱斯副总统的行踪。

yingyinNormal.en: As of now, Green's focusing in on the border between Virginia and North Carolina. Seth has a statement ready for this afternoon.
yingyinNormal.zh: 到目前为止，格林主要在搜索弗吉尼亚州和北卡罗来纳州的边界。赛斯为今天下午的事准备好了声明。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 结算单; 清单; 报表
评估报告; 对儿童进行特殊教育评估认定

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 陈述；声明；报表；报道；账单；结算单；官方声明；供述；呈现

word_family.mean: n. 状态；状况；情况；国家；政府；领土；州；邦；盛观；隆重的礼仪；印记；压印；印图

sense_info_list.en: something that you say or write that gives information or an opinion

examination_example.sentence: You'll want to state it overtly, contextualizing your <highlight>statements</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你会想要公开地陈述它，把你的陈述放在上下文中。

examination_example.sentence: They learn over time that such <highlight>statements</highlight> appease parents and friends – and their own consciences.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着时间的推移，他们认识到这种说法安抚了父母和朋友——以及他们自己的良心。

examination_example.sentence: The author views Milton Friedman's <highlight>statement</highlight> about CSR with skepticism.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作者对米尔顿·弗里德曼关于企业社会责任的说法持怀疑态度。

sense_info_list.en: the act of stating or expressing something in words

examination_example.sentence: While the <highlight>statement</highlight> is vague, it represents one starting point.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然这个声明含糊不清，但它代表了一个开端。

examination_example.sentence: The Small Business & Entrepreneurship Council advocacy group said in a <highlight>statement</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 小企业和企业家理事会倡导组织在一份声明中说到。

examination_example.sentence: The company made misleading <highlight>statements</highlight> about the pipe.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该公司对管道做了误导性的陈述。

word_usage.usage: “发表声明”可用issue a statement或make a statement表达。
“关于...的声明或报告”用statement on/about sth.表达。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 州与州之间的；州际的；他州的；别的州的
adj. & adv. 遍布某州的；某州范围的
n. 陈述；声明；报表；报道；账单；结算单；官方声明；供述；呈现

word_family.mean: n. 状态；状况；情况；国家；政府；领土；州；邦；盛观；隆重的礼仪；印记；压印；印图

sense_info_list.en: a definite or clear expression of something in speech or writing

examination_example.sentence: In a <highlight>statement</highlight>, Burberry denied that switching to "see now, buy now" has had an impact on waste.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在一份声明中，巴宝莉否认改用“即看即买”对浪费产生了影响。

examination_example.sentence: In a <highlight>statement</highlight>, the high street retailer defended itself by saying that the burnt clothing had failed safety tests.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在一份声明中，高街零售商为自己辩护说，烧毁的衣服没有通过安全测试。

sense_info_list.en: the act of stating or expressing something in words

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Statements</highlight> like these will make you sound aimless and lost.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 像这样的陈述会让你听起来漫无目的，不知所措。

examination_example.sentence: That last <highlight>statement</highlight> was the most instructive because there was a remarkably strong correlation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最后一种说法是最具有启发性的，因为两者之间存在显著的相关性。

examination_example.sentence: The correct interpretation of this <highlight>statement</highlight> is not about copying, but rather about creating your own style.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对这句话的正确解释不是抄袭，而是创造自己的风格。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 个人声明；个人陈述；个人说明

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 州与州之间的；州际的；他州的；别的州的
n. 陈述；声明；报表；报道；账单；结算单；官方声明；供述；呈现

word_family.mean: n. 状态；状况；情况；国家；政府；领土；州；邦；盛观；隆重的礼仪；印记；压印；印图

sense_info_list.en: the act of stating or expressing something in words

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>statement</highlight> given below is for your reference.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 以下陈述供你参考。

examination_example.sentence: Admissions officers read every personal <highlight>statement</highlight> that arrives.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 招生官员阅读每一份寄来的个人陈述。

examination_example.sentence: What must applicants do in their personal <highlight>statements</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 申请人在个人陈述中必须做什么？

sense_info_list.en: something that you say or write that gives information or an opinion

examination_example.sentence: They would avoid examining their financial <highlight>statements</highlight>, budgeting, and discussing financial matters with those closest to them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们会避免检查他们的财务报表、预算，以及与他们最亲近的人讨论财务问题。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 陈述；声明；报表；报道；账单；结算单；官方声明；供述；呈现

word_family.mean: n. 状态；状况；情况；国家；政府；领土；州；邦；盛观；隆重的礼仪；印记；压印；印图

sense_info_list.en: the act of stating or expressing something in words

examination_example.sentence: Please decide which part is false in the following <highlight>statement</highlight>, then underline it and explain why.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 请判断以下陈述中哪个部分是错误的，然后在下面划线并解释原因。

examination_example.sentence: Which of the following <highlight>statements</highlight> about the girl is TRUE according to the passage?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据文章，下列关于女孩的陈述哪一项是正确的？

sense_info_list.en: a definite or clear expression of something in speech or writing

exam_freq_info.chinese: 声明; 陈述; 表态

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 陈述；声明；报表；报道；账单；结算单；官方声明；供述；呈现
adj. 定期的；规定的；一定的；阐明的

word_family.mean: n. 状态；状况；情况；国家；政府；领土；州；邦；盛观；隆重的礼仪；印记；压印；印图

sense_info_list.zh: 声明; 陈述; 表态

examination_example.sentence: His or her parents will have to write a <highlight>statement</highlight> and make sure that the phone is turned off during class.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他或她的父母将不得不写一份声明，并确保在课堂上关闭手机。

examination_example.sentence: What does the underlined word "<highlight>statement</highlight>" probably mean in Chinese in the passage?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 文章中带下划线的单词“statement”在汉语中大概是什么意思

examination_example.sentence: Which <highlight>statement</highlight> is TRUE about passengers in paragraph 3?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 关于第三段中的乘客，哪一项陈述是正确的？
